mapper.insert: INSERT INTO survey ( id, survey_title, survey_content, survey_write_time, survey_start_time, survey_end_time, survey_type, survey_anonymous, survey_target_scope, emp_id, closed ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{surveyTitle}, #{surveyContent}, #{surveyWriteTime}, #{surveyStartTime}, #{surveyEndTime}, #{surveyType}, #{surveyAnonymous}, #{surveyTargetScope}, #{empId}, 'N' )

INSERT INTO survey_questions ( survey_no, survey_question_content, survey_is_required, survey_question_type, survey_options, survey_additional_explanation ) VALUES ( #{surveyNo}, #{heading}, 'N', #{family}, #{choicesCsv}, NULL )
mapper.select: SELECT q.survey_question_no AS question_id, q.survey_question_content AS question_text, r.survey_response_content AS answer_text, COUNT(*) AS count FROM survey_questions q JOIN survey_response r ON q.survey_question_no = r.survey_question_no WHERE q.survey_no = #{surveyId} GROUP BY q.survey_question_no, q.survey_question_content, r.survey_response_content
